    Biography

    Education

    • Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology , 2014 - 2019
    • B. E. in Computer Science and Technology , Shandong University, 2010 - 2014

    Working Experience

    • Associate Professor, Beijing Institute of Mathematical Sciences and Applications, September 2024 - Now
    • Staff Researcher, Baidu Research, April 2021 - September 2024
    • Senior Researcher, Baidu Research, October 2019 - April 2021
    • Research Intern, 4Paradigm, January 2019 - September 2019
    • Research Assistant of Prof. Francis Y. L. Chin, The University of Hong Kong, July 2013 - September 2013

    Selected Recognition

    • World's Top 2% Scientists List (single year), Stanford University and Elsevier company, 2024
    • Senior Engineer in Artificial Intelligence, Shenzhen Municipality, 2022
    • Technology Pioneer (Top 6 in Technology Platform Group), Baidu Inc., 2021
    • Best Paper Runnerup for IJCAI WSRL, 2021
    • Senior PaddlePaddle Developer Expert, Baidu Inc., 2021
    • Best Cooperative Win-Win Award, Baidu AI Cloud, 2021
    • Rising Star of the Year, Baidu Research, 2020
    • Baidu Pride Best Team–PaddlePaddle Team (Team Member), Baidu Inc., 2020
    • Baidu AIDU Recruitment Program, Baidu Inc., 2019
    • ICML Travel Award, 2018
    • Hong Kong PhD Fellowship (HKPFS), 2014-2017
    • IEEE CIS Outstanding Student-Paper Travel Grants, 2017
    • Google Excellence Scholarship, 2013
    • The CCF Outstanding Undergraduate Award, 2013
    • President Scholarship, Shandong University (Top 1 in major), 2013
    • China National Scholarship (Top 0.2%), 2011-2013
    • Outstanding Winner of the National English Competition for College Students in the Finals, 2013
